alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 3:40PM AKST until December 12 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION HEAVY SNOW EVENT FOR THE HIGHWAYS... .A storm force front in the Gulf of Alaska is bringing precipitation to the panhandle. Warm, moist southerly air will lift into the cooler temperatures over the highways at higher elevations to produce moderate to heavy snow. Another front will push up from the southwest Tuesday morning which will transition snow in the Haines Highway to rain. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 14 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Klondike Highway north of mile marker 6 and Haines Highway west of Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult and is discouraged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...For the Haines Highway, heavy snow is expected through Tuesday morning before transitioning to rain. Snow has the potential to last longer for the Klondike Highway beyond Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water with you in case of an emergency. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
